title: Girl for One Day CYOA
author: BeTheGirlCYOA
description:
I've sensed that you've always wanted to try out being female? I've got the perfect opportunity for you. I can give you a female body and life, but I can only muster up enough magic to create 24 hours of this reality. 

What I can do is let you relive this one day multiple times, groundhog day style. I'm going to give you 100 points to design a body and life. Once you've done this, however many points are left can be squared to figure out how many loops of the day you get to live.

contains.title: Physical
contains.description: Design the physical body of your female life.

contains.title: Height
contains.description: How tall are you?

contains.title: Short
contains.description: You'll be quite short, you'll need to look up to most females.

contains.title: Medium
contains.description: You'll be the average female height.

contains.title: Tall
contains.description: You'll be closer in height to average men and tower over other girls.

contains.title: Dyed
contains.description: Any unusual colour you want.

contains.title: Short
contains.description: Your hair is boyish, barely covering the your ears.

contains.title: Medium
contains.description: Your hair comes down to your shoulders.

contains.title: Long
contains.description: Your hair reaches far down your back.

contains.title: Boyish
contains.description: Your face is manly.

contains.title: Plain
contains.description: A face that doesn't stand out from the crowd.

contains.title: Cute
contains.description: Cute face that someone can really fall in love with.

contains.title: Beautiful
contains.description: An instantly attractive face that draws looks wherever it goes.

contains.title: Body
contains.description: What's your natural figure?

contains.title: Weight
contains.description: How much fat on your bones? You won't be able to burn any weight at the end of every loop.

contains.title: Fitness
contains.description: How naturally fit is your body.

contains.title: Unfit
contains.description: Your body quickly becomes out of breath if you do any exercise.

contains.title: Healthy
contains.description: Healthy fitness.

contains.title: Fit
contains.description: You're flexible and have quite good reflexes.

contains.title: Athlete
contains.description: You're a true athlete, toned body and high stamina.

contains.title: Mental
contains.description: Now it's time to design the mind of the body you're taking over and you're mind.

contains.title: Control
contains.description: How much control do you have over the choices you'll be making?

contains.title: Full Control
contains.description: You have full control over the choices you'll make during each loop. As long as you're avoiding parents/bosses/others, you'll have no problem ditching all responsibilities.

contains.title: Partial
contains.description:
You'll find yourself being forced to go to the events that you're meant o be going to, but you can make choices once you're there.

You won't be able to ditch class/work but you can certainly decide not to pay attention when you're there.

contains.title: None
contains.description: You'll find yourself on autopilot going through the life of the body you're inhabiting. You'll have no choice but to pretty much do the exact same thing every loop.

contains.title: Personality
contains.description: Who's personality is present in your mind?

contains.title: Your personality
contains.description: You'll completely keep your own personality and way of thinking during this whole experience. The choices below will only affect the life and perception of you before the day of the loop.
Your personality will be halfway between your own personality and the personality you create below.

contains.title: Her personality
contains.description: Your personality will be entirely based around the choices you select below, interests, thoughts etc.

contains.title: Intelligence
contains.description: How naturally intelligent and well educated are you?

contains.title: Sexuality
contains.description: Where do your sexual preferences lie?

contains.title: Romance
contains.description: How romantic are you?

contains.title: Zero Interest
contains.description: You have no interest in any romance with your sexual partners.

contains.title: Romantic
contains.description: Interested in traditional romance.

contains.title: Romance Obsessed
contains.description: Very focused on the romantic side of relationships.

contains.title: Libido
contains.description: How strong is your bodies need for sex?

contains.title: Low
contains.description: You can put up with sex but it's mainly not what you're looking for in a partner.

contains.title: Medium
contains.description: Regular sexual need.

contains.title: High
contains.description: You NEED sexual pleasure regularly, you'll find yourself needing to deal with this through every loop.

contains.title: Social Personality
contains.description: Choose 1 , 2 or 3 of these personality traits. If you only choose 1 it will be her dominant personality.

contains.title: Boring
contains.description:
Incompatible with cool.

All of your interests are boring and basic.

contains.title: Cool
contains.description:
Incompatible with boring.

You're interested in some cooler more out there stuff. People like to hear your thoughts on things.

contains.title: Bitchy
contains.description:
Incompatible with friendly.

People who aren't friends with you tend to have a very bad opinion of you.

contains.title: Friendly
contains.description:
Incompatible with bitchy.

Everyone knows you and is welcoming towards you around your local area.

contains.title: Shy
contains.description:
Incompatible with flirty.

You find it difficult to muster up the courage to talk to any romantic interests you have.

contains.title: Flirty
contains.description:
Incompatible with shy.

Everyone knows you're a big flirt and you feel confident coming on to people.

contains.title: Life
contains.description: Now it's time to design the general life of the female you'll be living as.

contains.title: High School
contains.description:
(18-19 years old)

You're in your final year of high school. It's going to be hard to do whatever you want as your parents will have plans for you regarding school and life throughout the loops.

contains.title: College
contains.description:
(19-22 years old)

You're living away from home on a college campus. Hopefully there's enough there to keep you busy.

contains.title: Low End Career
contains.description:
(24-28 years old)

You work a part-time job as a waitress, retail worker or something along those lines. You live in a small apartment by yourself.

contains.title: High End Career
contains.description:
(28-40)

You work as an office manager, managing... business.

You live alone or with a partner in a larger apartment.

contains.title: Housewife
contains.description:
(22-40)

You're married and live in a house. You have anywhere between 0 and 6 children and may be pregnant during the loop.

contains.title: When
contains.description: What time period does the loop take place during?

contains.title: Modern
contains.description: It's the current date! You have access to modern amenities to entertain you through the loops.

contains.title: 2000's
contains.description: You've gone a little bit back, you potentially have a smartphone but chances are your main access to the internet is an older computer.

contains.title: 90's
contains.description: You're going to be exploring some very different styles.

contains.title: 80's
contains.description: You're back in the 80's, get to know this decade much better from this female perspective.

contains.title: Future
contains.description: Travel ten years into the future, adapt to the new technology as you adapt to your new female life.

contains.title: Finance
contains.description: How much money you got?

contains.title: Social Life
contains.description: What's your social standing in the area?

contains.title: Lonely
contains.description: Nobody really knows you that well, you'll get to make loads of first impressions every day.

contains.title: Best Friends
contains.description: You have one very close friend who trusts you completely.

contains.title: Popular
contains.description: Pretty much everyone in the local area knows you by name.

contains.title: Famous
contains.description: You're quite famous and are recognized wherever you go.

contains.title: Fashion Style
contains.description: You're going to have to wear whatever is in the wardrobe of the bedroom you wake up in. Let's find out what's in it.

contains.title: Basic
contains.description: Very basic female clothes.

contains.title: Girly
contains.description: A lot of pink and frilly things.

contains.title: Nerdy
contains.description: A little more alternative, pop tees and colorful things.

contains.title: Goth
contains.description: Blacks. Loads of blacks and fishnet.

contains.title: Fashion Sense
contains.description: Now lets see what quality the clothes actually are.

contains.title: None
contains.description: Nothing seems to really match and it seems to be quite cheap.

contains.title: Fashionable
contains.description: There are definitely some very nice potential outfits in here.

contains.title: Slutty
contains.description: Everything seems to be quite tight-fitting and lowcut.

contains.title: Small Possessions
contains.description: Choose as many as you'd like.

contains.title: Glasses
contains.description: Your vision isn't quite 20/20, but you've got a stylish pair of glasses.

contains.title: Drug Dealer
contains.description: You have a local drug dealers number in your phone, who should be able to get you anything you want. He's pretty friendly with you so you should be able to always ask to pay him back tomorrow.

contains.title: Library Card
contains.description:
You've got a library card to a local library that seems to have an unworldly amount of books. 

If you're going to spend a lot of time here, you may as well get some reading done, right?

contains.title: Big Possessions
contains.description: If you are lower or middle class choose up to 2, if you are higher class or mega-rich choose up to 4.

contains.title: Car
contains.description: You've got a drivers licence and a car. You can drive as far away from where you wake up as you can  manage within your 24 hours.

contains.title: Entertainment
contains.description: You've got a pretty good entertainment system for the time period you'll be in.

contains.title: Bank Account
contains.description: You have a card to a bank account you can access, with $5000 dollars you can access. This money is refreshed every loop obviously, so unless you're spending more than 5000 every day, you'll never run out.

contains.title: Personal Assistant
contains.description: You don't actually OWN this person of course, but they work for you and will be willing to do pretty much anything. They can organise or book stuff while you're doing other activities.

contains.title: Teleportation
contains.description: You have a teleportation device that you can use to travel any place in the world. Opens up the possibilities of what you can do in your day A LOT.

contains.title: The Day
contains.description: Okay now you've worked out the general life you'll be taking. Now it's time to decide the specifics of the day you'll be looping through.

contains.title: Season
contains.description: The good thing about seasons is that they don't last too long, sadly inside of this loop you're going to be trapped inside of one season for potentially years. Consider this choice carefully.

contains.title: Autumn
contains.description: Leaves and festivities are fun, but make sure to bring an umbrella with you everyday. The rain shower at 3.30pm is quite heavy.

contains.title: Winter
contains.description: Snowdays are fun, but when everyday is a snow day you might get a bit bored of the struggle to go anywhere.

contains.title: Spring
contains.description: Watch the flowers continue to bloom and bloom and bloom and bloom...

contains.title: Summer
contains.description: It's warm and sunny every day, only downside is the sweat.

contains.title: Busy Day
contains.description: Today happens to be a very busy day in the life you're taking, no matter what life stage you're at. Between part-time jobs, exams and appointments there seems to be always some activity you can avoid, or potentially have to take part in depending on your control.

contains.title: Relaxing Day
contains.description: It's a very typical day in your life, school/college or work are happening, but nothing too exciting or important is happening during any of them.

contains.title: Day Off
contains.description: It's the weekend, no work/school/college! You won't need to avoid any responsibilities, because you don't have any!

contains.title: Vacation
contains.description: You're not in your typical location, but away in a different city on holiday. It shouldn't affect many of your other choices as you packed and brought anything you need. If you're in high school it's a family holiday, anything else it's a holiday by yourself or with your friends.

contains.title: Location
contains.description: Where were you sleeping the night before, where will you wake up at the beginning of every loop.

contains.title: Your Bed
contains.description: You'll wake up in your own bed with all your stuff readily available for you to begin your day.

contains.title: One Night Stand
contains.description: You'll always wake up in someone else's bed that you slept with the night before. You'll have to do the walk of shame home across town/campus/building every morning, in the clothes you'd worn out the night before.

contains.title: Tent
contains.description: What, did you just come out of a retreat? A musical festival? Either way you always wake up in the woods, a bus ride away from civilization.

contains.title: Physical State
contains.description: What sort of physical state do you wake up in?

contains.title: Hot Mess
contains.description: Your hair is a complete mess and it looks like you haven't took care of yourself for quiet some time. It's going to take a while each morning if you want to look relatively presentable.

contains.title: Presentable
contains.description: You're going to need to give your hair a brush and add some make-up, but you could easily head out the way you wake up if you want and most people wouldn't bat an eye.

contains.title: Woke Up Like This
contains.description: You wake up with a full face of make-up and styled hair. If you want anyone to think you haven't spent all morning getting ready you're going to need to add some downgrading.

contains.title: Hangover
contains.description: You wake up with a splitting headache and grumpy. You're going to need to figure out a remedy quickly, or you're going to spend most of this experience in bed.

contains.title: Tired
contains.description: You should slowly drift out of sleep, but you feel relatively refreshed when you wake up. Maybe you'll need some motivation to get out of bed.

contains.title: Fully Refreshed
contains.description: You wake up quickly, bright and early and ready for the day.

contains.title: Drawbacks
contains.description: Here are some drawbacks I can give you in order to let you relive this day more times.

contains.title: Flu
contains.description: You've got the flu throughout this experience. A hoarse throat, runny nose and a light cough. Nothing painful, just gets in the way of stuff.

contains.title: Period
contains.description: This day happens to be the worst day of your menstrual cycle. Expect bleeding and painful cramps.

contains.title: Acne
contains.description: There's a few annoying pimples on your face, you really wish they'd go away.

contains.title: Wanted
contains.description: As soon as you wake up word the entire local police force is on the lookout for you. Each day as soon as they catch sight of you, you'll need to start moving quickly until the day resets or you'll be going to sleep in a cell.

contains.title: Stalker
contains.description: A local man has become a little obsessed with you. He sleeps outside your house and will follow you throughout the day as much as he can. He never tries anything, just always watching you from a slight distance.

contains.title: Serial Killer
contains.description: A masked serial killer is hunting you down and intends to kill you on sight. Eventually through repetition I'm sure you'll learn his every move, but you're certain to painfully die a few times.

contains.title: Permadeath
contains.description: A little added risk, or big one, depending on how you were planning to spend your days. Originally if you died you simply skipped to next reset, but now if you die a single time you immediately are returned to normal life and won't get any more loops.

contains.title: Pregnant
contains.description:
Typically getting pregnant won't affect you at all, since your organs reset every loop. However if you take this option when you become pregnant you will be returned to your normal life and won't get any more loops.

You'll need to practice very safe sex or lose this whole opportunity.

contains.title: No Reset
contains.description: Now every loop has a 1/100 chance of not resetting for another 24 hours. It means you get to experience a little extra time, but if you've gotten yourself into a difficult situation you'll have to live with it for another 24 hours.

contains.title: Insane
contains.description: You had just recently been diagnosed as criminally insane. No one will every question the weird shit you do, but no one will ever take you seriously either.

contains.title: Nightmares
contains.description: Every night during this process you will have terrifying extremely intense nightmares.

contains.title: Random
contains.description: The loops are just a little bit more random than they should be. Every now and again people will do or say things that they didn't do other days. Sometimes the weather will be a little different, small changes like that.

contains.title: Bonuses
contains.description: Here are few extra things I can offer you if you're willing to shave a few days off.

contains.title: Remaining Days
contains.description: You will have a discrete tattoo on your wrist displaying how many loops you have remaining.

contains.title: Keep Box
contains.description: You have a 1x1 meter box in your bedroom. Anything you put into the box won't reset between loops. You can keep journals, keepsakes, photos or whatever else in the box.

contains.title: New Life
contains.description: Every 100 days you can fall asleep while making physical contact with someone and you'll get to live the next single loop in their body instead.

contains.title: Return
contains.description: Now it's time to work out how you're going to return back to your normal life.

contains.title: One Night
contains.description: When you go to sleep tonight the loops will begin. Once you finish your loops you'll wake back up tomorrow like nothing every happened.

contains.title: Bit by Bit
contains.description:
Whenever you want to live one of your loops go to bed with a pair of panties under your pillow. Once you want to return to your life from the loops place a pair of boxers under your pillow. 

If you want you can do this as many times as you'd like and spread your loops throughout your mortal life until your old age.

contains.title: No Return
contains.description:
Once your loops are over that's it. You won't return to your normal life, you'll just fade away into whatever comes after life. 

Think hard about choosing this option.

contains.title: The End
contains.description: Alright that's it. Time to square your points (multiply them by themselves) and figure out how many loops you have. If you're not happy with your amount I'm willing to offer you an extra 25 points if you write how you're planning to use your loops on the post on the subreddit.
